name: Popover.Root

disableFocusTrap.description: Whether or not to disable the focus trap that is applied to the popover when it's open.
disableFocusTrap.description_zh: Whether or not to disable the focus trap that is applied to the popover when it's open.

preventScroll.description: Whether or not to prevent scrolling the body while the popover is open.
preventScroll.description_zh: Whether or not to prevent scrolling the body while the popover is open.

closeOnOutsideClick.description: Whether or not to close the popover when clicking outside of it.
closeOnOutsideClick.description_zh: Whether or not to close the popover when clicking outside of it.

closeOnEscape.description: Whether or not to close the popover when pressing the escape key.
closeOnEscape.description_zh: Whether or not to close the popover when pressing the escape key.

open.description: The open state of the link popover component.
open.description_zh: The open state of the link popover component.

onOpenChange.description: A callback that fires when the open state changes.
onOpenChange.description_zh: A callback that fires when the open state changes.

openFocus.description: Override the focus when the popover is opened.
openFocus.description_zh: Override the focus when the popover is opened.

closeFocus.description: Override the focus when the popover is closed.
closeFocus.description_zh: Override the focus when the popover is closed.

portal.description: Where to render the popover when it is open. Defaults to the body. Can be disabled by passing null
portal.description_zh: Where to render the popover when it is open. Defaults to the body. Can be disabled by passing null

onOutsideClick.description: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.
onOutsideClick.description_zh: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.

description: The root component used to manage the state of the state of the popover.

slots.name: ids
slots.description: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).
slots.description_zh: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).
